name: 2020 C64 Basic Games Compilation
description:
This collection of games are a group of converted BASIC games from other 8-bit platforms of the 1980s era including the Atari, TRS-80 and VIC20 to the Commodore 64.

This set of games include text adventures, board games, card games, strategy and quizzes.

1. Americas' Capitals
2. Arkenstone
3. Dice Arithemetic
4. Dogbite
5. Domino Arithemtic
6. Adventure of the Dancing Dragon
7. Escape
8. Gingerbread Caper
9. Hasami Shogi
10. Jatzie (DE)
11. Abraham Lincoln Quiz
12. Logical Fruit
13. House on Misty Hill
14. Moo
15. Poker Karten (DE)
16. Poker Cards 
17. Regenbogen-Passage (DE)
18. Rainbow Passage
19. Solitare 4
20. Telephone Adventure
21. Transition
22. Yhatzi 

These games are in addition to the two sets of 76 games (152 games in all) that recognise the 40th anniverary of the VIC20

https://coutgames.itch.io/vic20-to-c64-ported-collection
https://coutgames.itch.io/2020-vic20-to-c64-enhanced-collection
